name: Leshrac
title: Tormented Soul
lore: Leshrac is a tormented spirit who saw the true nature of reality and was driven mad by its horror.

splitEarth.name: Split Earth
splitEarth.description: Splits the earth, stunning and damaging enemies in an area after a delay.

diabolicEdict.name: Diabolic Edict
diabolicEdict.description: Summons explosions around Leshrac that damage enemies and structures.

lightningStorm.name: Lightning Storm
lightningStorm.description: Calls a lightning storm that jumps between enemies, slowing and damaging them.

pulseNova.name: Pulse Nova
pulseNova.description: Creates waves of damaging energy around Leshrac. Drains mana while active.
